name: Lynium
description:
Lynium is a competitive 2D and 3D music video game

You can play the different traditional or original game modes

Lynium Standard:
Gameplay with Rhythm Keys and Melody Keys

Lynium Mania:
Traditional gameplay 4K/7K (and other variants)

The game is compatible with most controllers. (XInput included)

CREATOR OF BEATMAPS
You can create your beatmaps and share them with everyone!

MULTIPLAYER
Play with other players in the world!

DOWNLOAD BEATMAPS
You can download the beatmaps that other people have uploaded to the game!

WORLD RANKING
All maps are ranked, get the best score to be the best in the world!

RHYTHM DETECTION
The game detects the rhythm and improves the experience!

AND MUCH MORE...
Start playing now and discover all the other features!
